data.md:MetaData: Age determination of sediment core STAROSEL, Staroselsky Moch, Russia
Peat bog. Physiography: depressions in watershed area. Surrounding vegetation: swamp forests. Location: close to Tudovka river. Core diameter: 5 cm
Late Glacial and Holocene landscape dynamics in the southern taiga zone of East European Plain according to pollen and macrofossil records from the Central Forest State Reserve (Valdai Hills, Russia)
